nodes.title: Add onWrite method with CommandSender in CommandProcessor
Implements player head and firework metas
Attempted fix of deadlock from tryAcquisition.
Fix and Cleanup Redstone Placement Rule
Function in CommandSender to send ColoredText
Ignore kotlin to allow stdlib and reflect to be accessed by extensions.
Handle goal functions inside EntityCreature instead of GoalSelector
Allow EntityCreature in GoalSelector to be null
Added distanceSquared where applicable and changed BlockPosition distance calculation
Cleanup and ensure extensions have valid names.
Update Recipe code, add abstraction for different recipe packet types.
Final for enums and some annotations.
Get the server JAR for assets directly from Mojang.
Add more recipe types and support for Smithing.
Use an array to store custom block id's in BlockManager for faster lo…
Rename some old StorageFolder messages & comments
Change access of id arrays in DynamicChunk to protected
Use block index in chunk serialization
Rename plugins to Extensions and add basic support.
Start Entity abstraction, add some missing entities.
Make utility classes final and not constructable.
Update EntityType To use Namespaced IDs
Feature/scheduler - Optimization of the scheduler system
Disable keep alive packet handling when using BungeeCord.
Remove old NBT code, use Hephaistos
Check home directory for Minecraft files on Linux
Used CommandLineArgs wrapper for ResourceDir override & MC Version
Added SLF4J and Log4J2 as the logging platform.
Use Standard README and add widgets.
AbstractInventory: more StackingRule#apply usages instead of ItemStack#withAmount
InventoryModifier to AbstractInventory and additional methods for inventories
Path update cooldown for attacking entity goals
Added isRegistered(DimensionType) and getDimension(NamespaceID) to DimensionTypeManager
Add util method to send a packet to an audience
Expose player to/from boss bar methods
Write scoreboard objects using standard JSON serialization
Use EntitySoundEffectPacket in no location playSound method, fixes #194
Ensure boss bars are registered on creation
Write scoreboard values using legacy strings
Add ItemStack constructor without amount parameter
Fixed write PlayerHead by a shift+click to get a player head with nbt
Projectile improvements, custom entity position synchronization cooldown support
Added CanPlaceOn and CanDestroy for ItemStacks
Add events for player sneaking and sprinting changes
Switched TargetSelectors result caching from EntityCreature field to local one in GoalSelectors
AbstractProjectile; arrows now call EntityAttackEvent, without damaging entities
Caching entity target found by goal selectors
Fixing armor equip with right clicking
Custom item display of a single ItemStack for different Players
Fixed somme read for NBT Tag to ItemStack
Methods to read ServerPackets and write ClientPackets
Use FastMath from Mad's data structures
Add ability to get Block type from given position
Add ability to get Instance by UUID
Set the last location at the end of refreshPosition and at construction
Added ExceptionManager for custom exception handling
[Deprecation] Remove type specific methods in Arguments
Add EatBlockGoal instance check & MeleeAttackGoal range.
Check for removed entity before targeting
Cleanup and remove most warnings in the project
Add a method to open a book in Player
Made some field in PlayerInventory protected for allowing usage in child classes
Add Potion Add and Remove events
Delegate creation of spawn packets to Entity#getSpawnPacket
Fix block placement when close to block
Increase rate limit to support requestful mods.
Fix broken tests and fix github workflow
Add sendGroupedPacket convenience method to PacketGroupingAudience
Implement some Adventure methods into ConsoleSender
Ensure proper error when extension.json is missing
Set default UUID provider to Mojang UUIDs
Fix entity compile error in Demo package
Update book meta to use components
Refactor and remove classes from entity package.
Switch internal ExtensionManager workings to NIO
NamespaceID should be compatible with other Key Implementations.
Added InventoryHolder interface which allows any class to contain an inventory
Add an option to start the server with no terminal
Remove git submodule and gradle copy task.
Use minestom-data to generate our enums.
Convenience toMilliseconds, add UpdateOption methods to TaskBuilder
Send the real amount of blocks in a chunk section.
Send correct number of blocks inside a section,
Update github workflow to decide which files to clear
Fixes a crash when the server has only one available processor.
Remove block light data and send full sky data
Avoid NPE when getting NBT in ItemTag
Update DataImpl#clone to actually clone the data
Added entity class argument to /summon command
Server list ping overhaul (dynamic responses, multiple versions, open to LAN, UT3 query)
Added a yaw fix to for issue #168
Mitigate the lag spike caused by MC-162253
Additional ways to interact with extensions
Add method to send a custom ServerListPing response
Fix pose issues caused by flight
Fix FakePlayers not being able to re-spawn, fix entities being immediately unloaded after switching dimensions
Make loadDynamicExtension and loadExtensionList provide their Extensions instead of boolean
Use proper logging to log class loader finalization
Add chunk reference to Tick, blockPosition (Tick) -> relativeBlockPosition
Resolving inventory- events and condition slot-issues
Fix duplication glitch w/ shift-click, and fix double-click calling startCondition with the wrong inventory
Fix cursor being set to air due to incorrect window items packet
Use Pre/PostCommandEvent instead of CommandEvent, give CommandResult
Fix cursor item not being set properly when inventory click event is cancelled
Add missing husk to meta map
Automatically trigger a jitpack build on new commits
Fix GLFW-based framebuffers not using the proper threads
[2] Don't enforce automatic scheduling of `Task`  within `TaskBuilder`
Fix up tab completion for EntityType
Close AnvilLoader Region files when unregistering instance - Fixes #423
Fix outdated minestom.com references in code and README
Fix range parsing and reduce boilerplate
Rewrote tags API to allow for better access and checking
Don't enforce automatic scheduling of `Task`  within `TaskBuilder`
Switch annotations from `@ApiStatus.Internal` to `@ApiStatus.Experimental` for utility classes.
Use active hand when updating item state
Fix player stop sprinting when changing attributes
Fix a bug with the map api
Add Tab Completion to Console w/ JLine
Allow player to use creative mode features in creative mode
Changed how the position turned into a short
Set time to negative when timeRate is 0
Add more name cases to ArgumentEnum
Make magic values public in PlayerAbilitiesPacket
Expand RelativeBlockBatch to allow for larger range
Fix incorrect coordinate encoding in RelativeBlockBatch
Fix deserialization issues w/ ItemMeta had Name/Lore containing lit…
Change ArgumentLong to use actual longs
Modify /gamemode to behave more like vanilla
(ArgumentGroup) Rename group to arguments, add getter for arguments
Add ComponentHolding to packets for fully support automatic translation
Fix extension resource load in Windows
